original_title: Cooperative Wholesale Establishment (CWE) to be restructured
original_body_lines: The cabinet of Ministers approved the proposal presented by the Minister of Trade, Commerce and Food Security to appoint an operational monitoring committee to carry out the activities related to the restructuring of the Cooperative Wholesale Establishment (CWE) and to implement the proposed restructuring process.
‘Updated National Physical Planning Policy and the Plan 2048’ to be implemented
Efforts underway to protect consumer rights and crack down on non-compliant food manufacturers – Minister
